sys_script_include.name: Fetch location SI

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_890d537e9375021094e3f15a7bba1043
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.Fetch location SI</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Fetch location SI</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserLocation = Class.create();
GetUserLocation.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getLocation: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_emp'))) {
            return gr.location.getDisplayValue();
        }
        return ''; // Return an empty string if the user record is not found or location is empty
    },

    type: 'GetUserLocation'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-30 09:27:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>890d537e9375021094e3f15a7bba1043</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch location SI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_890d537e9375021094e3f15a7bba1043</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-30 09:43:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
